Traits.Name: Dart
Traits.Description: At the start of its turn, the land shark shoves itself as far as possible towards the closest foe. If the closest foe is standing on terrain height 1 or higher, as soon as the shark would move onto a terrain space, it collides with the terrain and stops moving.

Traits.Name: Landswim
Traits.Description: The shark has resistance to all damage and can phase through characters. The shark cannot move through or on terrain height 1 or higher. If the shark collides with terrain, it is stunned, winded, and loses this trait until the end of the next round.
